text: Fuel is an American rock band from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. It was created by guitarist-songwriter Carl Bell in 1989. They are known for their hit songs "Shimmer" from the album Sunburn, "Hemorrhage (In My Hands)" and "Bad Day" from the album Something Like Human, as well as "Falls on Me" from the album Natural Selection. ==References== Category:1989 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Pennsylvania Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American rock bands Category:Musical groups from Pennsylvania Category:People from Harrisburg, Pennsylvania Category:Musical groups established in 1989
title: Fuel (band)
